ref.mixed-citation: Cerus Corporation; Emory University. A prospective, open label, phase 1 safety study of passive immune therapy during acute Ebola virus infection using transfusion of INTERCEPT plasma prepared from volunteer donors who have recovered from Ebola virus disease. In: ClinicalTrials.gov. Bethesda, MD: National Library of Medicine (US). NLM Identifier: NCT02295501; 2000 [cited 2019 February 6]. https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT02295501?term1/4ebolaþplasma&rank1/42.
